option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --config-file src/swiss_alignment/configs/accelerate/ds-zero3.yaml --num_processes 4 -m swiss_alignment.train_sft model=apertus-8b tokenizer_args.chat_template_name=tulu dataset=swissai-tulu-3-sft-0225 dataset_args.debug_oom=false dataset_args.debug_subsample.train=10_000 dataset_args.debug_subsample.eval=0 trainer=plw plw_args.prompt_loss_weight=0.0 training_args.max_grad_norm=10 training_args.per_device_train_batch_size=1 training_args.gradient_accumulation_steps=1 training_args.logging_steps=1 training_args.eval_strategy=no training_args.eval_on_start=false training_args.save_steps=100 training_args.average_tokens_across_devices=true artifacts_subdir=private job_subdir=test wandb.run_name=dev-plw resuming.resume=false
